mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tour (tourName, tourAddress, tourContent, tourTel, tourViews, tourThumbUp,longtitue, lattitue, tourImg) VALUES (#{tourName}, #{tourAddress}, #{tourContent}, #{tourTel}, #{tourViews}, #{tourThumbUp}, #{longtitue},#{lattitue},#{tourImg})
mapper.select: select * from tour order by tourNum desc limit #{startRow},#{pageBlock}
SELECT * FROM tour ORDER BY tourThumbUp DESC LIMIT 3;
select count(*) total_rows from tour where tourAddress like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from tour where tourName like #{searchWord}
mapper.update: update tour set tourThumbUp=#{tourThumbUp} where tourNum=#{tourNum}
update tour set tourViews= tourViews+1 where tourNum=#{tourNum}
